page.title: 13Open Day at Whitley Mill
page.content: On{Sunday 3rd June,}the 6 families at Whitley Mill held an{Open Day}to raise funds for the{Northumberland Wildlife {Trust. The main attraction was{Mr.and Mrs. {Charlton's garden.}Their house was once the mill itself, and they have made their garden into a{miniature {nature reserve,}complete with pond where ducks come and breed each year. It is very beautiful and{well worth a {visit}.Mrs.Dolden from the Farmhouse provided{teas,}the Cassons from the Miller's Cottage had a{garden plant stall,you could have a go on Jessica and Emily's{trampoline}for 5p, Anne Moore from the Vicarage was selling {icecream}, and Michael, Matthew and James were running a{competition}Guess our pet lamb's name. Caroline's pony gave{rides}.It was a sunny day,lots of visitors came. Our day was a{success!
